00036             class SPK_PREFIX Point : public Zone
00037             {
00038                         SPK_IMPLEMENT_REGISTERABLE(Point)
00039

00041 
00043                         // Constructor //
00045 
00050                         Point(const Vector3D& position = Vector3D(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f));

00058                         static inline Point* create(const Vector3D& position = Vector3D(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f));
00059 
00060                         // Interface
00061                         virtual inline void generatePosition(Particle& particle,bool full) const;
00062                         virtual inline bool contains(const Vector3D& v) const;

00080             inline Point* Point::create(const Vector3D& position)
00081             {
00082                         Point* obj = new Point(position);
00083                         registerObject(obj);
00084                         return obj;
00085             }
00086             
00087             inline void Point::generatePosition(Particle& particle,bool full) const
00088             {
00089                         particle.position() = getTransformedPosition();
00090             }
00091

00093             {
00094                         return false;
00095             }

00099                         return false;
